summary: Iteration 22 Testing - Framer Motion animations, mobile nav spacing, forgot password page, RSS image extraction, ResponsiveTabView. Fixed critical bug in AccountPage ResponsiveTabView (missing tab IDs and icon rendering issue). RSS image_url extraction not working - all news items use fallback Unsplash images.

minor.issue: image_url field always returns null - RSS image extraction not extracting images from feeds. Backend code has extraction logic but RSS feeds may not have media:content/thumbnail tags or images in expected format

action_items: FIXED: AccountPage ResponsiveTabView was missing tab IDs and icons were passed as component references instead of JSX - Fixed by adding id property and wrapping icons in JSX

INVESTIGATE: RSS image extraction - image_url is always null in API responses. The backend code has extraction logic but it may not be finding images in the actual RSS feed structure. Consider logging debug info to understand why images aren't being extracted.
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: AccountPage.js - ResponsiveTabView tabs were missing 'id' property and 'icon' was passed as component reference (Timer, Waveform, MapPin) instead of JSX (<Timer />, <Waveform />, <MapPin />)
INFO: Framer Motion animations are implemented correctly in DashboardPage.js with containerVariants and cardVariants
INFO: Mobile nav spacing (mb-14 md:mb-0) in DashboardLayout.js is working correctly - no content overlap
INFO: ForgotPasswordPage.js is properly integrated with AuthContext.resetPassword and Supabase
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 22 added: (1) Framer Motion animations on dashboard cards - WORKING, (2) Mobile nav spacing mb-14 - WORKING, (3) Forgot Password page with Supabase integration - WORKING, (4) ResponsiveTabView on AccountPage metrics - FIXED and working, (5) RSS image_url extraction - NOT WORKING (always null, using fallback images). The AccountPage.js was fixed to properly pass tab configuration to ResponsiveTabView.

dashboard_framer_motion.notes: Featured card and stream cards have fade-in animations, opacity transitions to 1

dashboard_news_cards.notes: News cards display correctly with fallback Unsplash images (RSS images not extracted)

mobile_nav_spacing.notes: Mobile bottom nav at position 788px (56px height), no overlap with content. mb-14 md:mb-0 working

forgot_password_page.notes: Page loads at /forgot-password, has email input, submit button, [BACK_TO_AUTH] link, shows success state after submission

account_page_responsive_tab_view.notes: Desktop shows 3-column grid, mobile shows tabs. Fixed by adding tab IDs and JSX icons

theme_toggle.notes: Light mode (rgb(235,213,171)) to Dark mode (rgb(27,33,26)) toggle working

sidebar_navigation.notes: All sidebar links visible and functional (FEED, DISCOVER, SEARCH, SAVED, BRIEFING, OFFLINE)

audio_player_bar.notes: Audio player bar visible at bottom of dashboard

rss_image_extraction.notes: Backend image_url extraction logic exists but returns null for all items. Using fallback Unsplash images.

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Dubawa fact-check API uses simulated responses

bug_fix_applied.issue: ResponsiveTabView crash - Objects not valid as React child
bug_fix_applied.root_cause: Tabs passed to ResponsiveTabView were missing 'id' property and 'icon' was passed as component reference instead of JSX element
bug_fix_applied.fix: Added id property to each tab (broadcast-hours, signals-processed, primary-region) and wrapped icon components in JSX (<Timer className='w-4 h-4' />)
